agentDescription: Schedules, reschedules, and cancels patient appointments within policy, synchronizing provider availability and sending HIPAA-aligned reminders with consent tracking.
deploymentEnvironment: GCP us-central1 HIPAA-eligible, private service perimeter; DR in us-east1 cold standby

dataLocationProfile.notes: All PHI remains in US regions under BAA; exports blocked by egress firewall

tools.toolDescription: Reads patient demographics, consent flags, and appointment history from the EMR via FHIR APIs.
tools.mitigations: FHIR scopes limited to schedule resources; PHI masking in prompts; access tokens short-lived

tools.toolDescription: Creates or updates appointment slots across providers and locations with policy checks for referral and insurance requirements.
tools.mitigations: Pre-checks for consent + insurance; human approval for cancellations inside 24h; change log sent to front desk

tools.toolDescription: Sends SMS/email reminders and pre-visit instructions using templated content.
tools.mitigations: Templates locked; no freeform text; opt-out respected per patient preferences

piiRedactionPipeline: PHI classifier at ingress; context-aware redaction before storage; outbound reminders filtered for minimum necessary
monitoringCoverage: PHI access logged to SIEM; anomaly alerts on cross-tenant queries; weekly manual review of 5% of scheduling actions; HIPAA audit feed retained 30 days.
failSafeBehavior: If insurance/referral checks fail or consent missing, halt changes and route to front-desk queue; disable reminders when preference flags are unclear; lock tool calls after 3 denied attempts in a session.
deprecationPolicy: Provide 45-day notice; freeze new features during cutover; archive manifests for audit for 12 months.
